name: emsys-monitor-web
description: EMSys (Engine Monitoring System) - Real-time Vehicle Engine Monitoring

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:app-platform: npm run build:frontend && rm -rf backend/public && mkdir -p backend/public && cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/public
